title: Spins, Flips & Magical SFX: Pack1
description: Transform Your Game with Sound of Spins, Flips & Magic!
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO


Introducing “Spins, Flips & Magical SFX: Pack 1”


Let your characters and objects flip and spin in the air with style as well as open treasure vaults, loot boxes, or enjoy winning moments with our bells and chimes-based sound effects.


  • Type 1: Perfect for in-air spins and flips of characters or objects. Various patterns using swish and whooshes.
  • Type 2: Similar to Type 1 but enhanced with layers of chimes and bells, creating a more magical and whimsical atmosphere.
  • Type 3: Features soft bells and chimes swells, ideal for opening loot boxes, treasures, transitions, and complementing visual effects. Various patterns using the same bells and chimes. 
  • Type 4: Combines the elements of Type 3 with strong whooshes and laser-like start points, giving a powerful edge and a magical spell vibe. Perfect for opening vaults, loot boxes, and celebrating winning moments.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 192


Number of Audio Waves: 192 + 192 + 192

Number of Audio Cues: 192 + 192 + 192

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 10:17

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
